greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of exp( Sum_{n>=1} -sigma_3(n)*x^n/n ) in powers of x.
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
mathematica: a[n_] := If[n<1, 1,-(1/n) * Sum[DivisorSigma[3, k] a[n - k], {k, n}]]; Table[a[n], {n, 0, 35}] (* _Indranil Ghosh_, Mar 16 2017 *)
program: (PARI) a(n) = if(n<1, 1, -(1/n) * sum(k=1, n, sigma(k, 3) * a(n - k)));
print([b(n) for n in range(36)]) # _Peter Luschny_, Nov 11 2020
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Mar 04 2017
